name: Touch Of The Wind
description:
Touch Of The Wind is a first-person dungeon crawler, limited to one resource where players must escape their way out of the prison, climbing its towers to new levels of alien production and life. Fight or Flight?

Escape through the Munga Biome and navigate through the Scholar Dungeon and Alien Production Chambers. Be wary of other life, do you trust them?

The Team

https://up2026599.itch.io/  Lucy - Leader, Designer, 2D/3D Artist,  Level Developer

https://hannahwaard.itch.io/ Hannah - 2D/ 3D Artist, Concept Artist
